question: What is the admission procedure?
How to do admission
intents.response_1: Notices and brochure for admission will be available on college website.Keep checking website for latest updates.Admission forms will be available on website.Fill the form take printout and attach copies of all necessary documents to form. Submit the form in the college with fees and bring all original documents for verification

question: What is the eligibility criteria
Am i eligible
intents.response_1: the candidates will be required to appear in Maharashtra Common Entrance Test (MHT CET). Admission to the B.E. lateral program is done on the basis of marks scored in Diploma in relevant discipline.

question: Are there any seats reserved for any kind of minority students?
Seat distribution
intents.response_1: Institute has 40% seats reserved for Sindhi Linguistic Minority students who are domicile of Maharashtra.

question: is scholarship offered
will i get discount
intents.response_1: Scholarship are offered by DTE. which is directorate if technical education. Scholarships for EBC, OBC, TFWS, handicapped students are also available. Using the EBC scholarship, a students fees can be reduced up to 40000 a year

question: what is the application process
how to apply
intents.response_1: Candidates need to fill up the application form online from the official website of the college. The application fee should be paid online through net-banking or credit/debit card. The application fee is INR 1770. An amount of INR 100 is to be paid by cash in the college at the time of registration and document verification.
